descriptions.wheatDescription: High-quality wheat, ideal for flour and baking. High demand in local and national markets.
descriptions.riceDescription: Aromatic Basmati rice, prized for its fragrance and long grains. Strong export potential.
descriptions.cornDescription: Versatile yellow corn, used for animal feed and food processing. Consistent demand year-round.
descriptions.barleyDescription: Nutritious barley, suitable for malting, feed, and food. Growing demand in health food sector.
descriptions.soybeansDescription: Protein-rich soybeans, essential for oil production and animal feed. A staple in the global market.
descriptions.sunflowerDescription: High-yield sunflower seeds for oil extraction. Market is driven by edible oil consumption.
descriptions.sugarcaneDescription: Primary source of sugar and biofuel. A major commercial crop with stable government-backed pricing.
descriptions.cottonDescription: High-quality fiber for the textile industry. Prices fluctuate based on global demand and quality.
descriptions.chickpeasDescription: A key pulse crop in India, used in a wide variety of culinary dishes. High domestic demand.
